title: Diamond as Big as the Ritz - but now

content.question: In context, the use of a dash and an ellipsis around the phrase “but now” at the end of the seventh paragraph mainly serves to

choices.label: emphasize John’s determination to leave the past behind
convey John’s sudden nostalgia for his hometown
suggest that John is embarrassed by his father’s views
illustrate John’s optimism about his current situation

content.answer: convey John’s sudden nostalgia for his hometown

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
